metadata.title: CVE-2022-32293 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
In ConnMan through 1.41, a man-in-the-middle attack against a WISPR HTTP query could be used to trigger a use-after-free in WISPR handling, leading to crashes or code execution.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-32293` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

connman - 1.41-2
connman-vpn - 1.41-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: connman package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.41-2').
